GUILLE
Oh, how unkind. Who? He has lain on
the very same spot, poor martyr, with¬
out budging, for eleven weeks.
DRAPER
Who’s this?
GUILLE
ShhhS I believe he’s resting, poor
man.
DRAPER
Who?
GUILLE
